```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
```  

## Introduction  
This R Markdown document demonstrates my ability to use models for data analysis using a dataset on diamond prices.

```{r load data, include=FALSE}
data(diamonds, package = "ggplot2")
names(diamonds)
```

## What affects diamond prices?  
In this report, we examine what factors predict the price of a diamond.

```{r summary, echo=FALSE}
summary(diamonds)

ggplot(diamonds, aes(x = price)) +
  geom_histogram(bins = 30, fill = "blue", alpha = 0.7) +
  ggtitle("Distribution of Diamond Prices") +
  xlab("Price (USD)")
```
